    User Generated Content Licence

    Content Licence Agreement

    1. YOUR RELATIONSHIP WITH THREE
      1. Your submission of visual and/or audio-visual content (including text, software, scripts, graphics, photos, sounds/audio, music, videos, animation, performances, characters, names, logos, trade marks, people featured, interactive features and other materials or elements which make up, are depicted in, or are associated with the content) (collectively “Content”) to Hutchison 3G UK Limited (trading as Three) with company number 03885486 and whose registered office is at Star House, 20 Grenfell Road, Maidenhead, SL6 1EH (“Three”) on one of Three’s social media channels (including, without limitation, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and SnapChat) (“Social Media Channels”) whether via an online submission form, a direct message, or a designated #hashtag post is subject to the terms of a legal agreement between you and Three.
      2. Your legal agreement with Three is made up of these terms and conditions (“Terms”) which constitutes a legally binding agreement between You and Three from the date you submit the Content. Please review the Terms carefully.
    2. ACCEPTING THESE TERMS
      1. To submit Content, you must first agree to the Terms. You may not submit Content if you do not accept, or cannot comply with, the Terms.
      2. By submitting or posting Content on one of Three’s Social Media Channels You hereby accept the Terms and agree to be bound by them.
      3. You may not upload Content and You may not accept these Terms if you are under the age of 18.
      4. You should print or save a copy of the Terms for your records.
    3. RIGHTS GRANTED TO THREE
      1. When you upload and submit Content to Three for inclusion on one of its Social Media Channels via an online submission form, a direct message, or a designated #hashtag post, You confirm that you are the sole rights holder to the Content and You:
        1. grant to Three a sole, royalty-free, worldwide, perpetual, and transferable licence (with the right to sub-licence to third parties) to use, copy, distribute, display, broadcast, modify, edit, adapt, add to, translate, create derivative works of, perform and otherwise exploit the Content in any manner or context (including, without limitation, for commercial, advertising, marketing and/or promotional purposes) in any media formats and through any media channels (whether now known or invented in the future); and
        2. shall, and shall procure that all persons appearing or featuring in the Content, unconditionally and irrevocably waive in favour of Three (its licensees, sub-licensees, assignees and successors in title), in respect of the Content, all moral rights and performers’ rights arising under the Copyright, Designs and Patents Act 1988 as amended from time to time (including (1) to be identified as the author/director/performer of the Content and (2) to object to derogatory treatment of the Content).
      2. By submitting the Content to Three for inclusion on one of its Social Media Channels via an online submission form, a direct message, or a designated #hashtag post, and granting to Three the above rights in and to the Content, You shall be given the opportunity to have the Content (in whole, part or modified by Three) published on one or more of Three’s Social Media Channels at the sole discretion of Three. You acknowledge and agree that this is good and valid consideration for the rights granted to the Content, which shall remain in full force and effect regardless of whether the Content is used/published or not.
    4. WARRANTIES & INDEMNITY
      1. You warrant and undertake to Three that:
        1. You are the sole legal and exclusive owner of all copyright and other intellectual property rights in the Content;
        2. You have not licensed or assigned, nor will you licence or assign, any of the copyright or other intellectual property rights in the Content to any person or entity other than Three;
    • You have the full right and power to enter into these Terms and to grant to Three the rights in and to the Content as set out in paragraph 3 above;
    1. You have obtained all the rights, clearances and/or licences necessary for Three to exercise the rights in and to the Content as set out in paragraph 3 above;
    2. the Content You submit will not contain any third party copyright or material that is subject to other third party proprietary rights (including rights of privacy or rights of publicity), unless you have a formal licence or permission from the owner to use the material and to grant Three the licence referred to in paragraph 3 above;
    3. the Content and all information given to Three is true, accurate, not misleading and complies with the Content Standards set out in paragraph 5 below;
    • if any person appears or is featured in the Content, You have obtained that person’s consent to your submission of the Content and their agreement to the Terms;
    • if any person under 16 years old appears or is featured in the Content, you confirm that You are that person’s parent or legal guardian;
    1. nothing in the Content, nor its use by Three (or its licensees, sub-licensees, assignees and successors in title), will infringe or violate any third party rights (including but not limited to copyright, moral rights, trade marks, patents, privacy rights, or any other statutory, common law or contractual rights of any individual or entity); and
    2. to the best of your knowledge, the Content contains no viruses or malware.
    1. You shall fully indemnify, defend and hold harmless Three (its parent, subsidiaries and affiliated companies, licensees, sub-licensees, assignees and successors in title) against any and all liabilities, costs, expenses, damages and losses (including any direct, indirect or consequential losses, loss of reputation and all interest, penalties and legal costs (calculated on a full indemnity basis) and all other professional costs and expenses suffered or incurred by the Three or the other indemnified parties arising out of or in connection with a breach of any of the warranties and undertakings made by You in paragraph 4a above.
    1. CONTENT STANDARDS
      1. You confirm and agree that the Content does not include any:
        1. untruthful or defamatory statements, or anything likely to bring a person’s or entity’s reputation into disrepute;
        2. personal data or sensitive personal data of any individual;
    • grossly offensive content (including anything indecent, obscene, socially irresponsible or that is likely to cause serious and widespread offense);
    1. hateful content (including anything that discriminates against or condones or promotes violence against individuals or groups based on race or ethnic origin, religion, disability, gender, age, nationality, sexual orientation, or gender identity);
    2. content that could amount to harassment (including trolling or cyber-bullying);
    3. threatening or intimidating content (including anything that encourages or promotes predatory behaviour or incites violence);
    • pornographic or sexually explicit content;
    • content that may encourage people to do things that might cause them injury;
    1. graphic or violent content;
    2. content that reinforces gender stereotypes or mocks individuals for not having the stereotypical attributes of their gender; or
    3. content that reinforces negative body image.
    1. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
      1. Nothing in these Terms shall exclude or limit Three’s liability for losses which may not be excluded or limited at law.
      2. Subject to paragraph 7a above, under no circumstances will Three (or its parent, subsidiaries or affiliated companies) be liable to You for:

        2. any loss, damage, costs or expenses which may be incurred by You as a result of Three’s use of the Content in accordance with these Terms (whether or not Three has been advised of or should have been aware of the possibility of any such losses arising).
      3. REPORTING INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY INFRINGEMENT

    2. any evidence supporting your notice of infringement.

      1. Three reserves the right to change the Terms from time to time. Where any changes are made, Three will publish the modified version of the Terms on the Platform, which will apply to all Content submissions from the date of publication of the modified Terms.
    2. GENERAL
      1. Three does not endorse any Content or any opinion or material expressed within the Content and Three expressly disclaims any and all liability in connection with the Content.
      2. The Terms constitute the entire agreement between You and Three and supersedes and extinguishes all previous agreements, licences, promises, assurances, warranties, representations and understandings between us, whether written or oral, relating to its subject matter.

    Show Me the Money Social Prize Draw

    These terms and conditions are the rules which apply to this ‘Show Me The Money’ competition. By submitting an entry, entrants agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

    1. Promoter:Hutchison 3G UK Limited trading as Three, Registered Office: Star House, 20 Grenfell Road, Maidenhead, Berkshire, SL6 1EH (“Three” or “We”). The Prize is administered and provided by Three.

    2. Dates: This competition will run from 23rd February 2018 at 13:30 PM GMT and closes on 23rd February 2018 at 13:40 GMT. All competition entries received after this time will be automatically disqualified.

    3. Eligibility: To be eligible to enter the Prize Draw entrants must be aged 16 and over and a UK resident (“Eligible Entrants”). We may ask the winner to provide proof of age. Employees of Three, its agents, contractors, consultants, or anyone professionally connected with the competition may not enter.

    4. Entry: To enter the competition, Eligible Entrants must:

    a. Guess the amount of money shown in the rotating receptacle.

    b. Publish their closest guess as a ‘comment’ on the live video feed during the above time period.

    5. Rules: The following rules shall also apply to the competition:

    a. Only one entry per person.

    b. Three reserves the right to exclude and/or disqualify any entry which it believes, in its sole and absolute discretion, fails to comply with these terms and conditions and/or is contrary to the spirit or intention of the competition.

    c. Entries automatically generated by a computer, late entries, and incomplete entries will not be accepted.

    6. Prize: The winner will receive a cash prize in £ (pounds sterling) equivalent to the value of Hong Kong Dollars in the jar. The cash will be provided to the winner in the form of a prepaid cash card with the value of the prize money on it.

    7. Selecting the winner: The winner will be the person whose guess is closest to the actual amount of Hong Kong Dollars within the jar. If more than one person submits the same closest guess, Three will randomly select the winner from the closest entries. The decision will be final and Three will not into any correspondence.

    8. Announcing the winner: Three will announce the winner of the prize on Instagram by the 24th of February 2018 at 3pm, sending a message to the winner via the platform, inviting them to continue the conversation via Direct Message.

    9. Contacting the winner: Reasonable efforts will be made by Three to contact the winner via Instagram Direct Message. If the winner cannot be successfully contacted, does not claim the prize within 5 days of notification, or is unable to comply with these terms and conditions, Three reserves the right to offer the prize to the person with the next closest guess (who will be randomly selected if there is more than one person with the same next closest guess).

    10. Redeeming your prize: The winner will be contacted by Instagram Direct message as above. In order to claim their prize the winner will need to provide their name address and date of birth to Three’s social media agency who will then send the winner a link to an online portal which will enable the winner to get a prepaid cash card to be sent out to them in the post. The winner will be able to use the card to buy things online or in stores, or can simply use the card to withdraw the money from a cash machine. Card use may be subject to additional terms provided by MasterCard.

    11. Privacy: Information that entrants supply when entering the competition will be used only in accordance with Three’s Privacy Policy.

    11. General:

    a. The prize may not be claimed by a third party and is not transferable.

    b. Three reserves the right at any time to substitute an alternative prize of similar or greater value.

    c. We reserve the right at any time to cancel, hold void, modify or supersede the competition where it becomes necessary to do so. Where applicable, any modified terms will be published at http://www.three.co.uk/terms-conditions.

    d. This competition is free to enter and no purchase is necessary.

    e. The winner of a prize will cooperate with any reasonable requests made by Three relating to any post-winning promotional activity (such as including his/her first name and entry being used in any and all Three marketing activity across all media).

    f. This promotion is in no way sponsored, endorsed or administered by, or associated with Instagram. You agree to completely release Instagram from any liability arising out of the competition.

    g. Three cannot accept responsibility for entries lost, corrupted, or delayed in transmission.

    h. Under no circumstances will Three (or its parent, subsidiaries and affiliated companies) be liable (unless such liability cannot be lawfully excluded) for any losses, damages, costs or expenses arising from or in any way connected with any errors, defects, interruptions, malfunctions or delays in the competition or the prize, and Three excludes liability, to the fullest extent permitted by law, for any loss or damage caused to the winner of the prize arising out of or connected to the prize or this competition.

    i. Entry into the competition signifies your acceptance of these terms and conditions.

    j. These terms are governed by English law.

    Top.

    Go Roam 2018 Social Competition.

    These terms and conditions are the rules which apply to this prize draw. By submitting an entry, entrants will be deemed to have agreed to be bound by them and the Content Licence Agreement that follows immediately afterwards.

    1. Promoter: Go Roam 2018 Social Competition (“Competition”) is organised by Hutchison 3G UK Limited trading as Three, Registered Office: Star House, 20 Grenfell Road, Maidenhead, Berkshire, SL6 1EH (“Three” or “We”). The Prizes are administered and provided by Three.

    2. Dates: The Competition opens on Wednesday 4th April 2018 at 9.00 AM GMT and closes on Wednesday 25th April at 11.59 PM GMT.

    3. Eligibility: To be eligible to enter the Competition entrants must be have a valid Facebook, Twitter or Instagram account, have a passport which is valid for at least six (6) months from the date of any return flight awarded, be over 18 years of age and a UK resident (“Eligible Entrants”). Entrants may be required to provide photographic ID to prove their eligibility. Should any citizen of another country outside of the UK be part of the winning group, they will have to provided their own visas should they be required. This competition is not open to employees of Three, its agents, contractors, consultants, or anyone professionally connected with the Competition.

    4. Entry: To enter the Competition, Eligible Entrants must share an example of their failed ‘group chat’ plans - more creative the better. Please refer to the competition video for guidance and examples [images, videos and text entries will be accepted [where applicable, as per platforms capabilities]]. Entries should be supplied as a single comment under the Three UK Facebook competition post, or in response to the competition posts onThree UK’s Twitter and Instagram pages, or as a comment under the Three competition post on Woody & Kleiny's own Instagram page [https://www.instagram.com/woodyandkleiny/]. Personal details included on an Entrant’s Facebook, Instagram or Twitter page including name and social media account URL may be captured (“Qualifying Entries”). By entering the Prize Draw via Facebook, Entrants’ data may be processed by Facebook in accordance with Facebook’s Terms of Service: https://www.facebook.com/legal/terms , Instagram’s Terms of service: https://instagram.com/about/legal/terms/before-january-19-2013/ , or Twitter’s Terms of Service: https://twitter.com/en/tos.

    5. Rules: The following rules shall also apply to the Competition:

    a. Only one entry per Eligible Entrant will be considered by Three and entered into the Competition. Multiple entries will render all entries, by that specific person, as void.

    b. Late entries will not be taken into consideration in selection of the winner.

    c. The winner warrants that all information submitted by them is true, accurate and complete and Three is not responsible for any information which is invalid or incomplete.

    d. Entries must not be offensive, inappropriate, immoral, defamatory, illegal or harmful to another person. In the event that a third party is featured, Entrants should ensure that permission is sought from such third party.

    e. Three reserves the right to exclude and/or disqualify any entries which it deems, in its sole and absolute discretion, to be (i) offensive or inappropriate (ii) failing to comply with these terms and conditions and/or (iii) is contrary to the spirit or intention of the Prize Draw.

    6. Prize: 1 single winner will receive the following for themselves and five of their friends:

    i) Six free return flights to Peru [Lima Jorge Chavez International airport] from London Gatwick airport in June 2018. The entirety of the trip will last 8 days. Three will pay for transport to London Gatwick for each of the 6 group members, there and back.

    ii) Accommodation will consist of 3x twin rooms at each hotel destination.

    iii) A total sum of £2000 spending money will be provided to the group as a whole for the duration of the 8-day trip to Peru. This will be supplied in pound sterling and will not be per person.

    iv) Multiple activities will be provided and paid for around Peru for the group - details to follow after winner selection. Three UK will pay for all internal transfers and flights where applicable in relation to these activities. Three reserves the right to film these activities and use such content for marketing purposes. Any videos will be retained for 1 year before they are deleted. Entrants can withdraw such consent by contacting Three UK.

    v) Only one Prize will be awarded. Allocation of the Prize remains at Three’s sole and absolute discretion.

    7. Selection of the winner: The winner will be randomly selected, under independent supervision, from all Qualifying Entries week commencing 16th April 2018. The decision will be final and Three will not enter into any correspondence.

    8. Contacting the winners: Reasonable efforts will be made by Three to contact the winners of each Prize via social media, email or telephone. If the winners of the Prizes cannot be successfully contacted do not claim the Prize(s) within 5 days of notification (by responding to Three), or are unable to comply with these terms and conditions, Three reserves the right to offer the relevant Prize to another Eligible Entrant. Failure to respond or failure to meet the eligibility requirements may result in forfeiture of the Prize.

    9. Redeeming your Prize: The winners will be required to provide full name, a valid UK postal address, phone number and email address to receive their Prize. Winners may also be required to submit additional valid identification before receiving the Prize. The winner warrants that all information submitted by them is true, accurate and complete and Three is not responsible for any information which is invalid or incomplete.

    10. Privacy: Information that entrants supply when entering the Competition will be used only in accordance with Three’s Web Privacy Policy and these terms. Our use of such information will also be subject to our Privacy Notice contained in Section 13 of the Terms and Conditions governing the use of Three Services. To view Three’s Web Privacy Policy, click here: http://www.three.co.uk/terms-conditions/your-privacy.

    11. General:

    a. The Prize is not transferable. No cash alternatives will be offered. Three reserves the right at any time to substitute an alternative prize of similar or greater value. Further, we reserve the right at any time to cancel, modify or supersede the Competition (including altering the Prize). No communications will be entered into by us regarding this. This Competition is free to enter and no purchase is necessary. The winner of the Prize agrees to cooperate with any reasonable requests made by Three relating to any post-winning promotional activity (such as including his/her first name and entry being used in any and all Three marketing activity across all media).

    b. This Competition is in no way endorsed by, sponsored by, associated with or administered by any third parties, including Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.

    c. All third-party terms and conditions relating to the Competition are beyond our control. Three cannot accept responsibility and will not be liable for any failures to abide by all third-party terms applying to the Prize.

    d. Three cannot accept responsibility for entries lost, corrupted, or delayed in transmission. Under no circumstances will Three (or its parent, subsidiaries and affiliated companies) be liable (unless such liability cannot be lawfully excluded) for any losses, damages, costs or expenses arising from or in any way connected with any errors, defects, interruptions, malfunctions or delays in the Competition or the Prize (or any aspects of them), and Three excludes liability, to the fullest extent permitted by law, for any loss or damage caused to a winner of the Prize arising out of or connected to the Prize or this Competition.

    e. Entry into the Competition signifies your acceptance of these terms and conditions. We also reserve the right to amend these terms and conditions at any time without notice. Any changes to the terms will be published at three.co.uk/terms. These terms are governed by English law.

    Content Licence Agreement

    1. Your relationship with three.

    a.     b. Your legal agreement with Three is made up of these terms and conditions (“Terms”) which constitutes a legally binding agreement between You and Three from the date you submit the Content. Please review the Terms carefully.

    2. Accepting these terms

    a. To submit Content, you must first agree to the Terms. You may not submit Content if you do not accept, or cannot comply with, the Terms.

    b. By submitting or posting Content on one of Three’s Social Media Channels You hereby accept the Terms and agree to be bound by them.

    c. You may not upload Content and You may not accept these Terms if you are under the age of 18.

    d. You should print or save a copy of the Terms for your records.

    3. Rights granted to three

    a. When you upload and submit Content to Three for inclusion on one of its Social Media Channels via an online submission form, a direct message, or a designated #hashtag post, You confirm that you are the sole rights holder to the Content and You:

    i. grant to Three a sole, royalty-free, worldwide, perpetual, and transferable licence (with the right to sub-licence to third parties) to use, copy, distribute, display, broadcast, modify, edit, adapt, add to, translate, create derivative works of, perform and otherwise exploit the Content in any manner or context (including, without limitation, for commercial, advertising, marketing and/or promotional purposes) in any media formats and through any media channels (whether now known or invented in the future); and

    ii. shall, and shall procure that all persons appearing or featuring in the Content, unconditionally and irrevocably waive in favour of Three (its licensees, sub-licensees, assignees and successors in title), in respect of the Content, all moral rights and performers’ rights arising under the Copyright, Designs and Patents Act 1988 as amended from time to time (including (1) to be identified as the author/director/performer of the Content and (2) to object to derogatory treatment of the Content).

    b. You acknowledge and agree that this is good and valid consideration for the rights granted to the Content, which shall remain in full force and effect regardless of whether the Content is used/published or not.

    4. Warranties & indemnity

    i. You are the sole legal and exclusive owner of all copyright and other intellectual property rights in the Content;

    iii. You have the full right and power to enter into these Terms and to grant to Three the rights in and to the Content as set out in paragraph 3 above;

    iv. You have obtained all the rights, clearances and/or licences necessary for Three to exercise the rights in and to the Content as set out in paragraph 3 above;

    v. the Content You submit will not contain any third party copyright or material that is subject to other third party proprietary rights (including rights of privacy or rights of publicity), unless you have a formal licence or permission from the owner to use the material and to grant Three the licence referred to in paragraph 3 above;

    vi. the Content and all information given to Three is true, accurate, not misleading and complies with the Content Standards set out in paragraph 5 below;

    vii. if any person appears or is featured in the Content, you have obtained that person’s consent to your submission of the Content and their agreement to the Terms;

    viii. if any person under 16 years old appears or is featured in the Content, you confirm that You are that person’s parent or legal guardian;

    ix. nothing in the Content, nor its use by Three (or its licensees, sub-licensees, assignees and successors in title), will infringe or violate any third-party rights (including but not limited to copyright, moral rights, trade marks, patents, privacy rights, or any other statutory, common law or contractual rights of any individual or entity); and

    5. Content standards

    a. You confirm and agree that the Content does not include any:

    i. untruthful or defamatory statements, or anything likely to bring a person’s or entity’s reputation into disrepute;

    ii. personal data or sensitive personal data of any individual;

    iii. grossly offensive content (including anything indecent, obscene, socially irresponsible or that is likely to cause serious and widespread offense);

    iv. hateful content (including anything that discriminates against or condones or promotes violence against individuals or groups based on race or ethnic origin, religion, disability, gender, age, nationality, sexual orientation, or gender identity);

    v. content that could amount to harassment (including trolling or cyber-bullying);

    vi. threatening or intimidating content (including anything that encourages or promotes predatory behaviour or incites violence);

    vii. pornographic or sexually explicit content;

    viii. content that may encourage people to do things that might cause them injury;

    ix. graphic or violent content;

    x. content that reinforces gender stereotypes or mocks individuals for not having the stereotypical attributes of their gender; or

    xi. content that reinforces negative body image.

    a. Nothing in these Terms shall exclude or limit Three’s liability for losses which may not be excluded or limited at law.

    b. Subject to paragraph 7a above, under no circumstances will Three (or its parent, subsidiaries or affiliated companies) be liable to You for:

    i. any indirect or consequential losses which may be incurred by You (including any loss of profits, loss of sales or business, loss of agreements or contracts, loss of actual or anticipated savings, loss of opportunity, loss of or damage to goodwill or reputation, loss of opportunity, any loss of, damage to, or corruption of data suffered by You);

    ii. any loss, damage, costs or expenses which may be incurred by You as a result of Three’s use of the Content in accordance with these Terms (whether or not Three has been advised of or should have been aware of the possibility of any such losses arising).

    7. Reporting intellectual property infringement

    Three respects the intellectual property rights of others. If you believe that any Content licensed to Three for use on its media channels infringes your intellectual property rights, please notify us by letter to Three Customer Services, Hutchison 3G UK Ltd, PO Box 333, Glasgow, G2 9AG.

    a. Please include the following:

    i. “Notice of Infringement” in the letter header;

    ii. your full name, telephone number and, if applicable, your company name;

    iii. an image of the alleged infringing Content;

    iv. a description of the rights alleged to be infringed; and

    v. any evidence supporting your notice of infringement.

    b. We will endeavour to respond to any notice of infringement, work with the complainant and the original person who submitted the allegedly infringing Content to resolve the issue.

    8. Changes to the terms

    a. Three reserves the right to change the Terms from time to time. Where any changes are made, Three will publish the modified version of the Terms on the Platform, which will apply to all Content submissions from the date of publication of the modified Terms.

    9. General

    a. Three does not endorse any Content or any opinion or material expressed within the Content and Three expressly disclaims any and all liability in connection with the Content.

    b. The Terms constitute the entire agreement between You and Three and supersedes and extinguishes all previous agreements, licences, promises, assurances, warranties, representations and understandings between us, whether written or oral, relating to its subject matter.

    c. You agree that Three may send You notices (including those regarding changes to the Terms) by email.

    d. If any provision of these Terms is or becomes invalid, illegal or unenforceable, it shall be deemed modified to the minimum extent necessary to make it invalid, illegal or unenforceable. If such modification is not possible, the relevant provision (or part) shall be deemed deleted. Any modification to or deletion of a provision (or part) shall not affect the validity and enforceability of the rest of these Terms.

    e. You agree that each member of the group of companies of which Three is a part shall be beneficiaries to the Terms and that such companies shall be entitled to directly enforce, and rely upon, any provision of the Terms which confers a benefit on or rights in favour of them.

    f. You agree that if Three does not exercise or enforce any legal right or remedy provided under these Terms or available by law, this will not constitute a waiver of that or any other right or remedy, nor shall it prevent or restrict the further exercise of that or any other right or remedy. No singe or partial exercise of such right or remedy shall prevent or restrict the further exercise of that or any other right or remedy.

    g. The Terms, and your relationship with Three, shall be governed by and construed in accordance with English law. You and Three agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the English Courts to resolve any legal matter arising from the Terms.

    Top.

    Three Record Store Day Snapchat Prize Draw.

    These terms and conditions are the rules which apply to this prize draw. By submitting an entry, entrants will be deemed to have agreed to be bound by them.

    1. Promoter: Record Store Day Snapchat (“ Prize Draw”) is organised by Hutchison 3G UK Limited trading as Three, Registered Office: Star House, 20 Grenfell Road, Maidenhead, Berkshire, SL6 1EH (“Three” or “ We”). The Prizes are administered and provided by Three.

    2. Dates: The Prize Draw opens on Friday 20th April 2018 at 17:00 GMT and closes on Saturday 21st April 2018 at 14:00 GMT .

    3. Eligibility: To be eligible to enter the Prize Draw entrants must be over 18 years of age and a UK resident (“ Eligible Entrants”). Entrants may be required to provide photographic ID to prove their eligibility. This Prize Draw is not open to employees of Three, its agents, contractors, consultants, or anyone professionally connected with the Prize Draw. Winners of the Prize Draw will be required to supply a valid email address as outlined in paragraph 8 below.

    4. Entry: To enter the Prize Draw, Eligible Entrants must have a valid Snapchat account and take a picture on Snapchat using one of three unique Prize Draw Snapchat filters. These filters will be ‘geo-fenced’ to locations at three secret record shops in Manchester. Eligible Entrants must therefore locate the record shops and be within their immediate vicinity in order to access the Snapchat filter and submit an entry. To find clues of the locations of the record shops, Eligible Entrants should check one of the following social media pages from 5pm Friday 20th April: i) Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ThreeUK/ ; ii) Twitter: “@ThreeUK” https://twitter.com/ThreeUK; Instagram: “@ThreeUK” https://www.instagram.com/threeuk/ ; and (iv) Snapchat: @threeuksnaps. In order to enter Entrants must take a ‘selfie’ using one of the three geo-fenced filters, add this to their Snapchat story and send this picture to @threeuksnaps on Snapchat. (“ Qualifying Entries”).

    5. Rules: The following rules shall also apply to the Prize Draw:

    a. Only one entry per Eligible Entrant will be considered by Three and entered into the Prize Draw. Multiple entries will render all entries, by that specific person, as void.

    b. Late entries will not be taken into consideration in selection of the winner.

    c. The winner warrants that all information submitted by them is true, accurate and complete and Three is not responsible for any information which is invalid or incomplete.

    d. Entries must not be offensive, inappropriate, immoral, defamatory, illegal or harmful to another person. In the event that a third party is featured, Entrants should ensure that permission is sought from such third party.

    e. Three reserves the right to exclude and/or disqualify any entries which it deems, in its sole and absolute discretion, to be (i) offensive or inappropriate (ii) failing to comply with these terms and conditions and/or (iii) is contrary to the spirit or intention of the Prize Draw.

    6. Prize: three winners will be selected in total, one winner from each store’s geofenced Snapchat filter. Each winner will receive £300 of store credit at the relevant record store to which the Snapchat filter in their entry correlates. Only one Prize will be awarded per store. The Prize cannot be transferred for cash or other alternatives. Allocation of the Prize remains at Three’s sole and absolute discretion. Exclusions may apply depending on the store and any such exclusions shall be communicated to the winner(s) by Three.

    7. Selection of the winner: The three winners will be randomly selected, under independent supervision, from all Qualifying Entries commencing 21st April 2018. The decision will be final and Three will not enter into any correspondence.

    8. Contacting the winners: Reasonable efforts will be made by Three to contact the winners of each Prize via direct message on Snapchat. Winners will be asked to respond to the direct message with a valid email address in order to receive further details of the Prize and how to collect it. If the winners of the Prizes cannot be successfully contacted, do not respond to the Three UK Snapchat message within 48 hours of notification, or are unable to comply with these terms and conditions, Three reserves the right to offer the relevant Prize to another Eligible Entrant. Failure to respond or failure to meet the eligibility requirements may result in forfeiture of the Prize.

    9. Redeeming your Prize: The winners will be required to provide an email address, full name and telephone number via Snapchat. Three will email the winners details of the Prize and the location to collect the Prize (and any limitations or exclusions which may apply). Prize will be allocated in the form of a gift voucher or credit - to be collected at each participating record store. The winner must take valid photo identification when collecting the Prize. The winner warrants that all information submitted by them is true, accurate and complete and Three is not responsible for any information which is invalid or incomplete.

    10. Privacy: Information that entrants supply when entering the Prize Draw will be used only in accordance with Three’s Web Privacy Policy and these terms. Our use of such information will also be subject to our Privacy Notice contained in Section 13 of the Terms and Conditions governing the use of Three Services. To view Three’s Web Privacy Policy, click here: http://www.three.co.uk/terms-conditions/your-privacy . By entering, winners consent for their winning Snapchat to be used in Three’s promotional and marketing material. To withdraw such consent, winners can contact our social team on patrick.mcsweeney@three.co.uk.

    11. General:

    a. The Prize is not transferable. No cash alternatives will be offered. Three reserves the right at any time to substitute an alternative prize of similar or greater value. Further, we reserve the right at any time to cancel, modify or supersede the Prize Draw (including altering the Prize). No communications will be entered into by us regarding this. This Prize Draw is free to enter and no purchase is necessary. The winner of the Prize agrees to cooperate with any reasonable requests made by Three relating to any post-winning promotional activity (such as including his/her first name and entry being used in any and all Three marketing activity across all media).

    b. This Prize Draw is in no way endorsed by, sponsored by, associated with or administered by any third parties, including Snapchat.

    c. All third-party terms and conditions relating to the Prize Draw are beyond our control. Three cannot accept responsibility and will not be liable for any failures to abide by all third-party terms applying to the Prize.

    d. Three cannot accept responsibility for entries lost, corrupted, or delayed in transmission. Under no circumstances will Three (or its parent, subsidiaries and affiliated companies) be liable (unless such liability cannot be lawfully excluded) for any losses, damages, costs or expenses arising from or in any way connected with any errors, defects, interruptions, malfunctions or delays in the Prize Draw or the Prizes (or any aspects of them), and Three excludes liability, to the fullest extent permitted by law, for any loss or damage caused to a winner of the Prizes arising out of or connected to the Prizes or this Prize Draw.

    Entry into the Prize Draw signifies your acceptance of these terms and conditions. We also reserve the right to amend these terms and conditions at any time without notice. Any changes to the terms will be published at http://www.three.co.uk/terms-conditions

    These terms are governed by English law.

    Top.

    Three Wall Ball Terms and Conditions

    TERMS AND CONDITIONS

    FOOTBALL

    Before we get into the terms and conditions, we’d like to make the rules of the Wall Ball challenge clear (“Rules of Wall Ball”):

    1. RULES OF WALL BALL


    DO


    DO NOT

    1. Stand at least a foot away from a wall.

     

    2. Plant one foot on the ground and balance a football on the other foot.

     

    This foot must be lifted off the ground and remain so for the duration of the challenge.

     

    3. Flick the ball off your foot so that it makes contact with the wall.

     

    4. When the ball returns, catch (and balance) it on the same foot before the ball hits the ground.

     

    5. Once you have regained control that counts as one completed Wall Ball.

     

    6. Repeat the above as many times as you can without losing control.  

     

  • Allow the ball to touch the ground, if the ball touches the ground your challenge is over.

    •  

  • Use your hands.

    •  

  • Kick/volley the ball against the wall continually (e.g. with your lace or the side of your foot). You must control/balance the ball on your foot momentarily before repeating.

    •  

    Three will not consider any entries which do not, in Three’s reasonable opinion, comply with the Rules of Wall Ball.

    For additional guidance, please see the instructional video and brief rules posted on our social channels and in selected Three stores.

    In the event of any conflict between such guidance and the Rules of Wall Ball, these Rules of Wall Ball shall prevail.



    WALL BALL COMPETITION

    These terms and conditions are the rules which apply to this competition. By entering, entrants are deemed to have accepted and be bound by them.

    1. Promoter: Wall Ball competition (“Competition”) is organised by Hutchison 3G UK Limited trading as Three, Registered Office: Star House, 20 Grenfell Road, Maidenhead, Berkshire, SL6 1EH (“Three” or “We”). The Prizes are administered and provided by Three.
    1. Dates: The Competition will take place at the participating stores listed below (each a “Location” and together the “Locations”) at the times and dates also listed below.

     





    Date & Time

    Three Store


    12 June 2018 

    (12:00 – 14:00)

     


    London Islington: 8-9 Upper Street, Islington, N1 0PQ, UK

    Liverpool One: 43b South John Street, Liverpool, L2 1TL, UK

    13 June 2018

    (12:00 – 14:00)

    Manchester Arndale: 27 Market Street, Manchester, M1 1WR, UK 

    14 June 2018
    (12:00 – 14:00)

    Birmingham Bullring: Unit SU332, The Bullring Shopping Centre, Birmingham, B5 4BU, UK

    15 June 2018 
    (12:00 – 14:00)

    Portsmouth: 190-192 Commercial Road, Portsmouth, PO1 1EX, UK

     

    1. Eligibility: To be eligible to enter this Competition entrants must be over 16 years of age and a UK resident (“Eligible Entrants”). Entrants may be required to provide photographic ID to prove their eligibility. This Competition is open to employees of Three, its agents, contractors, consultants, and anyone professionally connected with the Competition.

     

    1. Entry: To enter the Competition, Eligible Entrants must participate in the Wall Ball Challenge in one of the Locations in accordance with the Rules of Wall Ball at the times listed above and enter their information in-store. Personal details including name, telephone number and email address will be captured by members of Three staff (“Qualifying Entries”). All Qualifying Entries before the end of 06.07.18 will be automatically entered into our Ultimate Football Party Prize Draw, the terms and conditions for which are set out below.

     

    For the avoidance of doubt, Eligible Entrants who play Wall Ball in any of the above Locations on the above dates outside of the two hour time period listed will only be entered into the Ultimate Football Party Prize Draw and will not be entered into this Competition.

     

    1. Rules: The following rules shall apply to the Competition:

     

      a.  The Rules of Wall Ball as set out above.

     

      b.  The winner agrees to act in a responsible and considerate manner when playing the Wall Ball Challenge and agrees to comply with instructions of members of staff of Three (including in relation to health and safety).

     

      c.  The winner warrants that all information submitted by them is true, accurate and complete and Three is not responsible for any information which is invalid or incomplete.

     

      d.  Three reserves the right to exclude and/or disqualify any entries which it deems, in its sole and absolute discretion, to fail to comply with these terms and conditions, the Rules of Wall Ball or the spirit of this Competition.

    For the avoidance of doubt, multiple entries by each Eligible Entrant are permitted if there is sufficient time.

    1. Prize: 5 separate winners (1 at each of the Locations) will each receive a football shirt and a football signed by the ex-professional footballer who is present at that Location on the day of the Competition (each a “Prize”). Only one Prize per winner will be awarded. Allocation of the Prize remains at Three’s sole and absolute discretion.

     

    1. Selection of the winner: The winners will be the Eligible Entrant at each Location who achieves the highest score at the Wall Ball challenge. The winner shall be selected within twenty four (24) hours of the end of the Competition held at each Location. In the event of a draw, the Eligible Entrants who receive the joint highest score will be placed into a prize draw and the winner will be selected at random. The decision will be final and Three will not enter into any correspondence. 

     

    1. Contacting the winners: Reasonable efforts will be made by Three to contact the winners of each Prize via email or telephone within 24 hours of the end of the Competition in each Location. If the winners of the Prizes cannot be successfully contacted, do not claim the Prize(s) within 24 hours of notification (by responding to Three), or are unable to comply with these terms and conditions, Three reserves the right to offer the relevant Prize to another Eligible Entrant with the next highest score. If multiple Entrants have achieved the next highest score, these Entrants will go into a prize draw with the winner selected at random.

     

    1. Redeeming your Prize: The winners must return to the relevant Three store to collect their Prize. Winners may also be required to submit valid identification before receiving the Prize.

     

    1. Privacy: Information that entrants supply when entering the Competition will be processed by Three (and its technical service provider, MAPP (UK) Limited) solely for the purpose of administering this Competition. Your information will be deleted within 7 days of this Competition closing. For more information regarding how we process and keep secure your information, please see our privacy policy at http://www.three.co.uk/terms-conditions/your-privacy.

Entrants may be required to provide photographic ID to prove their eligibility. This Prize Draw is open to employees of Three, its agents, contractors, consultants, and anyone professionally connected with the Prize Draw.

     

    1. Entry: To enter the Prize Draw, Eligible Entrants must film a short clip of themselves playing wall ball in accordance with the Rules of Wall Ball and submit this by either:

     

      a)  Posting it on Three’s Facebook page: Facebook.com/ThreeUk (Eligible Entrants who submit an entry via Facebook may have to alter their privacy settings in order for Three to view the post) with the hashtag #ThreeWallBall;

     

      b)  Posting it on Twitter tagging @ThreeUK and adding the hashtag #ThreeWallBall; or

     

      c)  Posting it on Instagram tagging @ThreeUK and adding the hashtag #ThreeWallBall.

     

    Personal details including your name and handle may be captured (“Qualifying Entries”).

     

    1. Rules: The following rules shall also apply to the Prize Draw:

     

      a.  Only one entry per Eligible Entrant will be considered by Three and entered into the Prize Draw. Multiple entries will render all entries, by that specific person, as void.

     

      c.  Late entries will not be taken into consideration in selection of the winner.

     

      d.  Three reserves the right to exclude and/or disqualify any entries which it deems, in its sole and absolute discretion, to be (i) offensive, inappropriate or defamatory (ii) failing to comply with these terms and conditions and/or (iii) is contrary to the spirit or intention of the Prize Draw.

     

    1. Prize: One winner will receive a VIP tour of a Premiership football club. Dates, further details and exclusions to be confirmed by Three. Allocation of the Prize remains at Three’s sole and absolute discretion.

     

    1. Selection of winners:  The winner(s) will be randomly selected, under independent supervision, from all Qualifying Entries on 8 July 2018. The decision will be final and Three will not enter into any correspondence.

If the winners of the Prizes cannot be successfully contacted, do not claim the Prize(s) within 3 days of notification (by responding to Three), or are unable to comply with these terms and conditions, Three reserves the right to offer the relevant Prize to another Eligible Entrant. Failure to respond or failure to meet the eligibility requirements may result in forfeiture of the Prize.

To view Three’s Web Privacy Policy, click here: http://www.three.co.uk/terms-conditions/your-privacy.

    Slip and Slide iPhone X Prize Draw Terms & Conditions

     

    These terms and conditions are the rules which apply to this prize draw.  By submitting an entry, entrants will be deemed to have agreed to be bound by them
    .

    1. Promoter: Slip and Slide iPhone X (“Prize Draw”) is organised by Hutchison 3G UK Limited trading as Three, Registered Office: Star House, 20 Grenfell Road, Maidenhead, Berkshire, SL6 1EH (“Three” or “We”). The Prizes are administered and provided by Three.

     

    1. Dates: the Prize Draw opens on 9th July 2018 at 9am GMT and closes on 6th August 11.59pm GMT (the “Promotion Period”).

     

    1. Eligibility: To be eligible to enter the Prize Draw entrants must be a new follower of Three UK’s Instagram account (http://instagram.com/threeuk/) during the Promotion Period (“Eligible Entrants”). This Prize Draw is not open to employees of Three, its agents, contractors, consultants, or anyone professionally connected with the Prize Draw.

     

    1. Entry: To enter the Prize Draw, Eligible Entrants must begin following the official Three UK Instagram account (http://instagram.com/threeuk) during the Promotion Period (“Qualifying Entries”).

     

    1. Rules: Three reserves the right to exclude and/or disqualify any entries which it deems, in its sole and absolute discretion, as comply with these terms and conditions and/or is contrary to the spirit or intention of the Prize Draw.

    a) 16 July 2018: For all Qualifying Entries between 09.07.18 – 15.07.18 (“Week 1”);

    b) 23 July 2018: For all Qualifying Entries between 09.07.18 – 22.07.18 (“Week 2”);

    c) 30 July 2018: For all Qualifying Entries between 09.07.18 – 29.07.18 (“Week 3”).

    d) 6 August 2018: For all Qualifying Entries between 09.07.18 – 05.08.18 (“Week 4”)

    The decision will be final and Three will not enter into any correspondence. The winner of each week will not be included in the following week’s draw.


    1. Contacting the winners: Reasonable efforts will be made by Three UK to contact the winners of each Prize by responding in the Instagram comments and/or via an Instagram direct message. If the winners of the Prizes cannot be successfully contacted, do not claim the Prize(s) by 11.59pm on i) 18 July for the winner of Week 1, ii) 25 July for the winner of Week 2, iii) 1 August for the winner of Week 3 or iv) 8 August for the winner of Week 4 (by responding to Three, either on the comment or direct message), or are unable to comply with these terms and conditions, Three reserves the right to offer the relevant Prize to another Eligible Entrant. Failure to respond or failure to meet the eligibility requirements may result in forfeiture of the Prize.

Winners may also be required to submit additional valid identification before receiving the Prize. The winner warrants that all information submitted by them is true, accurate and complete and Three is not responsible for any information which is invalid or incomplete.

Our use of such information will also be subject to our Privacy Notice contained in Section 13 of the Terms and Conditions governing the use of Three Services. To view Three’s Web Privacy Policy, click here: http://www.three.co.uk/terms-conditions/your-privacy.

     

    1. General:

     

      a. The Prize is not transferable.  No cash alternatives will be offered.  Three reserves the right at any time to substitute an alternative prize of similar or greater value. Further, we reserve the right at any time to cancel, modify or supersede the Prize Draw (including altering the Prize). No communications will be entered into by us regarding this. This Prize Draw is free to enter and no purchase is necessary.       c. All third-party terms and conditions relating to the Prize Draw are beyond our control. Three cannot accept responsibility and will not be liable for any failures to abide by all third-party terms applying to the Prize.

     

      d. Three cannot accept responsibility for entries lost, corrupted, or delayed in transmission. Under no circumstances will Three (or its parent, subsidiaries and affiliated companies) be liable (unless such liability cannot be lawfully excluded) for any losses, damages, costs or expenses arising from or in any way connected with any errors, defects, interruptions, malfunctions or delays in the Prize Draw or the Prize (or any aspects of them), and Three excludes liability, to the fullest extent permitted by law, for any loss or damage caused to a winner of the Prize arising out of or connected to the Prize or this Prize Draw.

     

      e. Entry into the Prize Draw signifies your acceptance of these terms and conditions. We also reserve the right to amend these terms and conditions at any time without notice.  Any changes to the terms will be published at three.co.uk/terms. These terms are governed by English law.

    Social BBQ Roast July Prize Draw

    Social BBQ Roast July - Prize Draw Terms & Conditions

     

    These terms and conditions are the rules which apply to this prize draw. By submitting an entry, entrants will be deemed to have agreed to be bound by them.


    1. Promoter: BBQ Roast (“Prize Draw”) is organised by Hutchison 3G UK Limited trading as Three, Registered Office: Star House, 20 Grenfell Road, Maidenhead, Berkshire, SL6 1EH (“Three” or “We”). The Prizes are administered and provided by Three.


    2. Dates: The Prize Draw opens on July 11th 2018 at 9.00 AM GMT and closes on July 26th at 11.59 PM GMT.


    3. Eligibility: To be eligible to enter the Prize Draw entrants must be over 18 years of age, a UK resident and a follower of Three UK’s Instagram account @ThreeUK or Three UK’s Facebook Page (www.facebook.com/threeuk) (“Eligible Entrants”). Entrants may be required to provide photographic ID to prove their eligibility. This Prize Draw is not open to employees of Three, its agents, contractors, consultants, or anyone professionally connected with the Prize Draw.


    4. Entry: To enter the Prize Draw, Eligible Entrants must share a photo of their BBQ food. This can be shared either by posting the photo on their own Instagram account and using the hashtag #bbqroast, or by sending the photo to our Instagram account @ThreeUK (www.instagram.com/threeuk) via direct message, or by posting the photo in the comments section under the competition post on Facebook (www.facebook.com/threeuk) (“Qualifying Entries”).


    5. Rules: The following rules shall also apply to the Prize Draw:


    a. Only one entry per Eligible Entrant will be considered by Three and entered into the Prize Draw. Multiple entries will render all entries, by that specific person, as void.


    b. Late entries will not be taken into consideration in selection of the winner.


    c. The winner warrants that all information submitted by them is true, accurate and complete and Three is not responsible for any information which is invalid or incomplete.


    d. Three reserves the right to exclude and/or disqualify any entries which it deems, in its sole and absolute discretion, to be (i) offensive or inappropriate (ii) failing to comply with these terms and conditions and/or (iii) is contrary to the spirit or intention of the Prize Draw.


    e. By entering the competition, you agree to Three UK using your BBQ image to appear in a video on Three’s Instagram and Facebook page on 27 July 2018, where your image will be discussed/critiqued by social media influencers.


    6. Prize: Up to 15 winners will receive one cooking apron that has been personalised with your entry photo. Only one prize per winner will be awarded. Allocation of the prizes remains at Three’s sole and absolute discretion.


    7. Selection of winners: The winner(s) will be randomly selected, under independent supervision, from all Qualifying Entries on 27 July 2018. The decision will be final and Three will not enter into any correspondence.


    8. Contacting the winners: Reasonable efforts will be made by the Three UK social media team to contact the winners of each Prize via Instagram direct message or by commenting on their photo on Facebook or Instagram by 23:55 on 28 July 2018. If the winners of the Prizes cannot be successfully contacted, do not claim the Prize(s) within 24 hours of notification (by responding to Three), or are unable to comply with these terms and conditions, Three reserves the right to withdraw the offer of a Prize. Failure to respond or failure to meet the eligibility requirements may result in forfeiture of the Prize.


    9. Redeeming your Prize: The winner(s) will be required to provide a valid UK postal address to receive their Prize. Winners may also be required to submit additional valid identification before receiving the Prize. The winner warrants that all information submitted by them is true, accurate and complete and Three is not responsible for any information which is invalid or incomplete.


    10. Privacy: Information that entrants supply when entering the competition will be used only in accordance with Three’s Web Privacy Policy and these terms. Our use of such information will also be subject to our Privacy Notice contained in Section 13 of the Terms and Conditions governing the use of Three Services. To view Three’s Web Privacy Policy, click here: www.three.co.uk/terms-conditions/your-privacy.


    11. General:


    a. The Prize is not transferable. No cash alternatives will be offered. Three reserves the right at any time to substitute an alternative prize of similar or greater value. Further, we reserve the right at any time to cancel, modify or supersede the Prize Draw (including altering the Prize). No communications will be entered into by us regarding this. This Prize Draw is free to enter and no purchase is necessary. The winner of the Prize agrees to cooperate with any reasonable requests made by Three relating to any post-winning promotional activity (such as including his/her first name and entry being used in any and all Three marketing activity across all media).


    b. This Prize Draw is in no way endorsed by, sponsored by, associated with or administered by Instagram or Facebook.


    c. All third-party terms and conditions relating to the Prize Draw are beyond our control. Three cannot accept responsibility and will not be liable for any failures to abide by all third-party terms applying to the Prize.


    d. Three cannot accept responsibility for entries lost, corrupted, or delayed in transmission. Under no circumstances will Three (or its parent, subsidiaries and affiliated companies) be liable (unless such liability cannot be lawfully excluded) for any losses, damages, costs or expenses arising from or in any way connected with any errors, defects, interruptions, malfunctions or delays in the Prize Draw or the Prize (or any aspects of them), and Three excludes liability, to the fullest extent permitted by law, for any loss or damage caused to a winner of the Prize arising out of or connected to the Prize or this Prize Draw.


    e. Entry into the Prize Draw signifies your acceptance of these terms and conditions. We also reserve the right to amend these terms and conditions at any time without notice. Any changes to the terms will be published at www.three.co.uk/terms. These terms are governed by English law.

    These terms and conditions are the rules which apply to this prize draw. By submitting an entry, entrants will be deemed to have agreed to be bound by them.


    1. Promoter: Box Fresh ("Prize Draw") is organised by Hutchison 3G UK Limited trading as Three, Registered Office: Star House, 20 Grenfell Road, Maidenhead, Berkshire, SL6 1EH ("Three" or "We"). The Prizes are administered and provided by Three.


    2. Dates: The Prize Draw opens on 28th September 2018 at 9:00am GMT and closes on the 22nd October 11:59pm GMT (the "Promotion Period").


    3. Eligibility: To be eligible to enter the Prize Draw entrants must be [over 18 years of age] and a UK resident ("Eligible Entrants"). This Prize Draw is not open to employees of Three, its agents, contractors, consultants, or anyone professionally connected with the Prize Draw.


    4. Entry: To enter the Prize Draw, Eligible Entrants must become a new follower of Three UK’s Instagram account (http://instagram.com/threeuk) during the Promotion Period and view our promotional Instagram story ("Qualifying Entries").


    5. Rules: The following rules shall also apply to the Competition:

    a. Only one entry per Eligible Entrant will be considered by Three and entered into the Prize Draw. Any additional entries, by that specific person, will be invalid and not counted.

    b. Late entries will not be taken into consideration in selection of the winner.

    c. Three reserves the right to exclude and/or disqualify any entries which it deems, in its sole and absolute discretion (i) fails to comply with these terms and conditions and/or (ii) is contrary to the spirit or intention of the Prize Draw.


    6. Prize: Four winners will each receive the following; one months’ supply of loo roll, a microwave, a beer pong set and a pre-paid card for £150 ("Prizes"). Allocation of the Prizes remains at Three’s sole and absolute discretion.


    7. Selection of winners: The winners will be randomly selected, under independent supervision, from all Qualifying Entries on the following dates:

    a) 28 September 2018: For all Qualifying Entries between 28.09.18 – 01.10.18 (“Week 1”);

    b) 5 October 2018 : For all Qualifying Entries between 05.10.18 – 08.10.18 (“Week 2”);

    c) 12 October 2018 : For all Qualifying Entries between 12.10.18 – 15.10.18 (“Week 3”).

    d) 6 August 2018 : For all Qualifying Entries between 19.10.18 – 22.10.18 (“Week 4”)

    The decision will be final and Three will not enter into any correspondence. The winner of each week will not be included in the following week’s draw.


    8. Contacting the winners: Reasonable efforts will be made by Three UK to contact the winners of each Prize by responding via an Instagram direct message. If the winners of the Prizes cannot be successfully contacted, do not claim the Prize(s) by 11.59pm on i) 2 Oct for the winner of Week 1, ii) 9 Oct for the winner of Week 2, iii) 16 oct for the winner of Week 3 or iv) 23 October for the winner of Week 4 (by responding to Three via direct message), or are unable to comply with these terms and conditions, Three reserves the right to offer the relevant Prize to another Eligible Entrant. Failure to respond or failure to meet the eligibility requirements may result in forfeiture of the Prize.


    9. Redeeming your Prize: The winner(s) will be required to provide a valid UK postal address to receive their Prizes. Winners may also be required to submit additional valid identification before receiving the Prizes. The winner warrants that all information submitted by them is true, accurate and complete and Three is not responsible for any information which is invalid or incomplete.


    10. Privacy: Information that entrants supply when entering the competition will be used only in accordance with Three’s Web Privacy Policy and these terms. Our use of such information will also be subject to our Privacy Notice contained in Section 13 of the Terms and Conditions governing the use of Three Services. To view Three’s Web Privacy Policy, click here: http://www.three.co.uk/terms-conditions/your-privacy .


    11. General:

    a. The Prizes are not transferable. No cash alternatives will be offered. Three reserves the right at any time to substitute an alternative prize of similar or greater value.     Razer Phone 2 Emoji Competition


    These terms and conditions are the rules which apply to this competition. By submitting an entry, entrants will be deemed to have agreed to be bound by them.


    1. Promoter: Razer Phone 2 emoji competition (“Emoji Competition”) is organised by Hutchison 3G UK Limited trading as Three, Registered Office: Star House, 20 Grenfell Road, Maidenhead, Berkshire, SL6 1EH (“Three” or “We”). The Prizes are administered and provided by Three.

    2. Dates: the Prize Draw opens on 1st November 2018 at 12pm GMT and closes on 4th November 5pm GMT (the “Promotion Period”).

    3. Eligibility: To be eligible to enter the Emoji Competition entrants must be a UK resident with a Twitter account and be over 18 years of age (“Eligible Entrants”). This Emoji Competition is not open to employees of Three, its agents, contractors, consultants, or anyone professionally connected with the Emoji Competition.

    4. Entry: To enter the Emoji Competition, Eligible Entrants must: (1) follow Three UK’s Twitter handle (@ThreeUK); (2) reply to the competition tweet from Three UK within the Promotion Period with one or more emojis which evoke, depict or describe the name of a well-known video game; and (3) have the right to use the emojis in their entry (“Qualifying Entries”).

    5. Rules: Three reserves the right to exclude and/or disqualify any entries which it deems, in its sole and absolute discretion, as comply with these terms and conditions and/or is contrary to the spirit or intention of the Emoji Competition.

    6. Selection of winner: An independent judge will select the most creative entry (at its sole discretion) from all Qualifying Entries, within 48 hours of the end of the Promotion Period. The decision will be final and Three will not enter into any correspondence.

    7. Prize: One winner will receive one Razer Phone 2 (“Prize”). Only one Prize will be awarded. Allocation of the Prize remains at Three’s sole and absolute discretion, as do the colour and storage capacity of the handset.

    8. Contacting the winner: Reasonable efforts will be made by Three UK to contact the winner of the Prize via Twitter direct message. If the winner of the Prize cannot be successfully contacted or has not responded within 48 hours of being contacted, or they are unable to comply with these terms and conditions, Three reserves the right to offer the relevant Prize to another Eligible Entrant (subject again to the same independent selection as detailed in Clause 6). Failure to respond or failure to meet the eligibility requirements may result in forfeiture of the Prize.

    9. Redeeming your Prize: The winner will be required to provide a valid UK postal address to receive their Prize. The winner may also be required to submit additional valid photo identification before receiving the Prize. The winner warrants that all information submitted by them is true, accurate and complete and Three is not responsible for any information which is invalid or incomplete.

    10. Privacy: Information that entrants supply when entering the competition will be used only in accordance with Three’s Web Privacy Policy and these terms. Our use of such information will also be subject to our Privacy Notice contained in Section 13 of the Terms and Conditions governing the use of Three Services. To view Three’s Web Privacy Policy, click here: http://www.three.co.uk/terms-conditions/your-privacy .

    11. General:

    a. One entry per person. The Prize is not transferable. No cash alternatives will be offered. Three reserves the right at any time to substitute an alternative prize of similar or greater value. Further, we reserve the right at any time to cancel, modify or supersede the Emoji Competition (including altering the Prize). No communications will be entered into by us regarding this. This Emoji Competition is free to enter and no purchase is necessary. The winner of the Prize agrees to cooperate with any reasonable requests made by Three relating to any post-winning promotional activity (such as including his/her first name and entry being used in any and all Three marketing activity across all media).

    These terms and conditions are the rules which apply to this prize draw. By submitting an entry, entrants will be deemed to have agreed to be bound by them
    .

    1. Promoter: Razer Phone 2 image stretch ("Prize Draw") is organised by Hutchison 3G UK Limited trading as Three, Registered Office: Star House, 20 Grenfell Road, Maidenhead, Berkshire, SL6 1EH ("Three" or "We"). The Prizes are administered and provided by Three.

    Black Friday Prize Draw 2018

    These terms and conditions are the rules which apply to this competition. By submitting an entry, entrants will be deemed to have agreed to be bound by them.

    1.Promoter: Black Friday Prize Draw (“Prize Draw”) is organised by Hutchison 3G UK Limited trading as Three, Registered Office: Star House, 20 Grenfell Road, Maidenhead, Berkshire, SL6 1EH (“Three” or “We”). The Prizes are administered and provided by Three.

    2.Dates: The Prize Draw opens on 23rd November 2018 at 12:00pm GMT and closes on 3 Dec November at 14:00pm GMT (the “Promotion Period”).

    3.Eligibility: To be eligible to enter the Prize Draw entrants must be a UK resident with an Instagram account and be over 18 years of age (“Eligible Entrants”). The competition is not open to employees of Three, its agents, contractors, consultants, or anyone professionally connected with the competition.

    4.Entry: To enter the competition, Eligible Entrants must: (1) follow Three UK’s Instagram account (@ThreeUK); (2) tag a mate in any one of our nine prize draw posts within the Promotion Period (“Qualifying Entries”).

    5.Rules: Three reserves the right to exclude and/or disqualify any entries which it deems, in its sole and absolute discretion, as comply with these terms and conditions and/or is contrary to the spirit or intention of the Prize Draw.

    6.Prizes: The Prizes will consist of:

      1. Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.1 4G

      2. £50 cash

      3. easyJet Holiday vouchers £250

      4. £50 cash

      5. Beats solo wireless Headphones

      6. £50 Deliveroo vouchers

      7. Xiaomi Mi Band

      8. Google Home Mini

      9. iPhone X

    Only one on our nine prizes will be awarded per winner. Allocation of the Prizes remain at Three’s sole and absolute discretion.

    The following restrictions, limitations and information apply to the Deliveroo credit:

      1. Vouchers are personal to you and are not transferable.

      2. No cash alternative is available.

      3. Vouchers may not be used in conjunction with any other voucher or promo code offer.

      4. Voucher must be redeemed within six (6) months of receipt (see redeeming your prize below).

    The easyJet prize will consist of a £250 easyJet Holidays voucher to be spent on one EasyJet package holiday on www.easyjet.com/en/holidays . The following restrictions, limitations and information apply to the EasyJet holidays voucher:

      1. The voucher is personal to you and is not transferable.

      2. The prices of the holidays on the Website include flights, hotels, luggage and transfers.

      3. The voucher cannot be used for flights only. The EasyJet holidays service is provided by HotelOpia S.L.U. t/a EasyJet holidays.

      4. EasyJet Holidays’ standard terms and conditions will apply to any booking made and are outside of Three’s control.

      5. EasyJet holidays are ATOL protected.

      6. Only one holiday may be booked per voucher.

      7. No cash alternative is available – if your holiday is less than £250 no cash will be given.

      8. It is not possible to use your voucher for bookings less than 2 days from the date of travel.

      9. Your voucher may not be used in conjunction with any other voucher or promo code offer.

      10.Your voucher must be redeemed within six (6) months of receipt.

    7.Selection of winners: winners will be chosen at random within one week of the end of the Promotion Period. The decision will be final and Three will not enter into any correspondence.

    8.Contacting the winners: Reasonable efforts will be made by Three UK to contact the winners of the Prizes via Instagram direct message. If the winners of the Prizes cannot be successfully contacted or has not responded within 48 hours of being contacted, or they are unable to comply with these terms and conditions, Three reserves the right to offer the relevant Prizes to another Eligible Entrant (subject again to the same independent selection as detailed in Clause 7). Failure to respond or failure to meet the eligibility requirements may result in forfeiture of the Prizes.

    9.Redeeming the Prizes: The winners will be required to provide a valid UK postal address to receive their Prizes. The winners may also be required to submit additional valid photo identification before receiving the Prizes. The winners warrants that all information submitted by them is true, accurate and complete and Three is not responsible for any information which is invalid or incomplete.

    10.Privacy: Information that entrants supply when entering the competition will be used only in accordance with Three’s Web Privacy Policy and these terms. Our use of such information will also be subject to our Privacy Notice contained in Section 13 of the Terms and Conditions governing the use of Three Services. To view Three’s Web Privacy Policy, click here: http://www.three.co.uk/terms-conditions/your-privacy.

    11.General:

    a. One entry per person. The Prizes is not transferable. No cash alternatives will be offered. Three reserves the right at any time to substitute an alternative prize of similar or greater value. Further, we reserve the right at any time to cancel, modify or supersede the competition (including altering the Prizes). No communications will be entered into by us regarding this. The Prize Draw is free to enter, and no purchase is necessary. The winners of each Prize agrees to cooperate with any reasonable requests made by Three relating to any post-winning promotional activity (such as including their first name and entry being used in any and all Three marketing activity across all media).

    b. All third-party terms and conditions relating to the competition are beyond our control. Three cannot accept responsibility and will not be liable for any failures to abide by all third-party terms applying to the Prizes.

    c. The Prize Draw is in no way endorsed by, sponsored by, associated with or administered by Instagram.

    d. Three cannot accept responsibility for entries lost, corrupted, or delayed in transmission. Under no circumstances will Three (or its parent, subsidiaries and affiliated companies) be liable (unless such liability cannot be lawfully excluded) for any losses, damages, costs or expenses arising from or in any way connected with any errors, defects, interruptions, malfunctions or delays in the competition or the Prizes (or any aspects of them), and Three excludes liability, to the fullest extent permitted by law, for any loss or damage caused to a winners of the Prizes arising out of or connected to the Prizes or this competition.

    e. Entry into the Prize Draw signifies your acceptance of these terms and conditions. We also reserve the right to amend these terms and conditions at any time without notice. Any changes to the terms will be published at three.co.uk/terms. These terms are governed by English law.
